H0.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Butterfly

H1.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Ant

H2.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Wasp

H3.text: Apiculture is the raising and care of which creatures. Bee

A4.text: Beekeeping (or apiculture, from Latin: apis + culture) is the maintenance of bee colonies, commonly in artificial beehives.

A5.text: Honey bees in the genus Apis are the most commonly kept species but other honey producing bees such as Melipona stingless bees are also kept.
